h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The lower left path leads to another tentacle abomination you'll have to deal with carefully to avoid his lashing an boulder slam, and then head into a tunnel on the right.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
The lower left path leads to another tentacle abomination you'll have to deal with carefully to avoid his lashing an boulder slam, and then head into a tunnel on the right.
